item.title: Use hugo and github action to build blog
item.author: Author
item.description: Hugo Install Download binary file Choose the file in Hugo, Example 1 wget https://github.com/gohugoio/hugo/releases/download/v0.71.1/hugo_0.71.1_Linux-64bit.tar.gz Decompression 1 tar zxvf hugo_0.71.1_Linux-64bit.tar.gz -C /usr/bin hugo Create Repository create a repository in github which name “.github.io”, then download it to the local. 1 git clone https://github.com/<username>/<username>.github.io.git create .gitignore and commit, then push it to keep master branch checkout to hugo branch 1 git checkout -b hugo Build Blog Initial 1 2 3 cd blog # because .
